An exhortation to peace and union in a sermon preached at St. Lawrence-Jury, on Tuesday the 26th of Novemb. 1689 / by ... Gilbert, Lord Bishop of Sarum. Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
[4], 30, [2] p.
Printed for Richard Chiswell ..., London : 1689.
Half title: The Bishop of Salisbury's sermon of peace and union. Advertisement: p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
